channel.title: Professional Activities on Kyle M. Lang
channel.description: Recent content in Professional Activities on Kyle M. Lang

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach statistics, data science, and statistical programming at Utrecht University. I also give workshops on these subjects.

item.title: Research
item.description: I primarily study methods for missing data treatment. I also collaborate extensively with social-, behavioral-, and health-scientists.

item.title: Development
item.description: A lot of the research and consulting work I do involves intensive statistical computing. I also dabble a bit in R development.

item.title: Consulting
item.description: I offer professional statistical consulting as part of the Department of Methodology and Statistics Consultancy program.
